name: Ball Block
description: In this little game, you play as a little ball on a lane who has to dodge and weave your way through infinite blocks and collect tokens. These tokens, which are large red coins you encounter, they can be used to buy different colors for your ball. You can get a new high score  (mine is 199, I played it for a while) or maybe the most expensive color, red.  The way the score is scored is the amount of time you stay alive. I hope you enjoy, this is my first game EVER and it was really fun to make and I hope to bring more games in the future.
